name: faecal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
consisting of, contained in, or relating to the solid waste passed out of the body of a human or animal through the bowels: faecal matter Faecal bacteria can be present in sea water. See
faeces
More examplesFewer examplesThe meat was contaminated by microbes spread primarily by faecal material.Cholera is transmitted through faecal pathogens. The medication can cause a feeling of faecal urgency.
